insight_list.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load the data
flag_data = pd.read_csv("csvs/flag-74.csv")

# Convert the 'schedule' column to datetime for time-based analysis
flag_data["schedule"] = pd.to_datetime(flag_data["schedule"], errors="coerce")

# Drop rows with missing or invalid 'schedule' dates
flag_data.dropna(subset=["schedule"], inplace=True)

# Extract month and year for aggregation
flag_data["schedule_month"] = flag_data["schedule"].dt.to_period("M")

# Group by department and month to count schedules per department over time
schedule_counts = (
    flag_data.groupby(["department", "schedule_month"]).size().reset_index(name="count")
)

# Pivot for plotting (departments as columns, dates as index)
schedule_pivot = schedule_counts.pivot(
    index="schedule_month", columns="department", values="count"
).fillna(0)

# Plotting the data
plt.figure(figsize=(14, 8))
schedule_pivot.plot(kind="line", marker="o", linewidth=2, figsize=(14, 8))
plt.title("Monthly Schedule Distribution Across Departments")
plt.xlabel("Month")
plt.ylabel("Number of Schedules")
plt.grid(True)
plt.legend(title="Department", bbox_to_anchor=(1.05, 1), loc="upper left")
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.show()
